about_the_game:
Command a squad of three unique heroes in this top-down, pixel art adventure. Using click to move, engage in tab-target combat reminiscent of popular MMOs, seamlessly switching between your heroes in the heat of battle.

Explore Diverse and Dangerous Raids

Your raiding adventures will take you across a vast and varied landscape, each location teeming with unique challenges and rewards.
  • Descend into the Depths: Brave the treacherous sewers beneath the city, where lurking dangers and forgotten treasures await.
  • Venture into the Verdant Wilds: Navigate the mysterious forest, teeming with ancient creatures and hidden pathways.
  • Conquer the Frozen Peaks: Ascend the icy mountains, battling fierce blizzards and formidable foes.
  • Traverse the Scorching Sands: Survive the harsh desert, where blazing heat and relentless sandstorms test your resolve.
Each raid demands a different approach, forcing you to adapt your strategies and utilize your heroes' unique abilities to overcome the trials that lie ahead.

Ascend the Ranks!


Climb the raiding ladder, defeating increasingly difficult bosses to acquire new and stronger loot.

Unleash Devastating Spells


Each of your three heroes can equip 5 spell slots, granting access to a vast arsenal of magical abilities. Create synergistic builds that empower your party, control the battlefield, and obliterate your enemies.
  • Control the Chaos: Ensnare foes, manipulate their movements, or disrupt their attacks.
  • Empower Your Allies: Strengthen your heroes, bolster their defenses, or enhance their offensive capabilities.
  • Unleash Destructive Power: Rain down devastating attacks, harness elemental forces, and leave no enemy standing.
  • Mend Your Wounds: Heal your heroes, restore their vitality, and ensure their survival in the face of overwhelming odds.

Forge Your Unique Style


Earn valuable crafting resources as you play, which can be freely traded on the Steam Community Market. Put your hard-earned loot to use at the Crafting Forge, where you can create unique skins for your heroes, weapons, and loyal pets! Stand out from the crowd and showcase your personal flair as you conquer the raiding ladder.
